As TUCSON and UPROAR get up on the beds BUMP activated the control
panel next to each one and red beams of light began strobing across
both of them, scanning them intensly.

"Hmm." SANTON said from the readout screen. "This is similar to the
one Taratulus had developed, but it has changed somewhat."

"What?" BUMP said. "How? Why?"

SANTON scratched his head for a moment as he thought, "It looks like
it is the same thing that happened to human strains of flu and other
viruses. As they interact with the enviornment around them they change
and modify."

There was a pause from BUMP, "Does that mean that this strain is more
resistant to the cure?"

"I don't know." SANTON said. He glanced up at LEGACY who had just
finished entering his codes. "What do you think?"

LEGACY stepped away from his panel as the program executed. "Unknown,
this strain appears to be essentially the same." He said quietly. "I
have replicated the antiviral injection just as prescribed and have
added other additional medicines." He said coldly. "I would surmise
that it would be at least partially effective. However to what degree
is difficult to quantify."

There was a nod from BUMP, "So it may cure them . . . "

". . . or it may do nothing at all." SANTON said as he realized the
import of their words.

There was a hissing sound as injection guns rose from the beds of
TUSCON and UPROAR. Efficiently they fed both of them the 'cure'.

LEGACY, BUMP and SANTON looked at the vital signs readout and waited
to see what the response would be.

(TAG)

- Preston
